author: Leigh Beadon
description: Support us on Patreon » It was nearly 400 episodes ago when Catherine Bracy joined the podcast for a two part discussion (one, two) to talk about Silicon Valley culture and what investors are willing to fund. Now, more than a decade later, Catherine has released a new book, World Eaters: How Venture Capital Is Cannibalizing […]
title: Techdirt Podcast Episode 436: Venture Capital Is Eating The World

author: Mike Masnick
description: The US attended the UN Cybercrime Treaty signing ceremony in Hanoi this weekend, where 72 countries signed on to a Russia-backed framework for global surveillance cooperation. Whether the US actually puts pen to paper (and all the reporting on this is kind of cagey) is almost beside the point—by showing up and legitimizing the proceeding, […]
title: Biden Admin Blessed UN Surveillance Treaty, Trump Admin Gets To Abuse It

author: Mike Brock
description: Bari Weiss walked into 60 Minutes and asked the staff: “Why does the country think you’re biased?” The question stunned them into awkward silence. And it should have—not because it caught them off guard, but because it reveals everything wrong with what passes for journalistic sophistication in our moment. Let’s be precise about what Weiss is doing. She’s […]
title: Bari Weiss And The Tyranny Of False Balance

author: Daily Deal
description: Explore an incredible world of documentaries with a Curiosity Stream Standard Plan. This top-tier streaming service offers unlimited access to thousands of films, series, and shows to satisfy your thirst for knowledge. Discover a vast library of content with Curiosity Stream’s standard plan, spanning science, technology, history, nature, and art. Delve into an array of […]
title: Daily Deal: Curiosity Stream Standard Plan

author: Tim Cushing
description: Gregory Bovino probably only answers to two people. The first person would be himself. If he wants to do it, he does it, no matter what the actual chain of command is. On the morning of Jan. 7, Jesús Ramírez and other day laborers huddled in a Home Depot parking lot in Bakersfield, California, hoping […]
title: Border Patrol Chief Greg Bovino Ordered To Explain Why Personally Violated A Court Order On Force Usage

author: Karl Bode
description: Whether it’s Jeff Bezos lobotomizing the Washington Post, Elon Musk turning Twitter into a far right propaganda mill, or Larry Ellison buying CBS, CNN, and TikTok, the country’s shittiest right wing billionaires aren’t being subtle about their quest to dominate what’s left of U.S. media. And Trump’s FCC is paving the way by destroying whatever […]
title: King Trump Makes It Clear He Wants His BFF Larry Ellison To Own Warner Brothers

author: Timothy Geigner
description: I very much promise that you don’t need to know about, or even care about, American football in any way for this post. We should all know at this point that the “blame video games” crowd has not gotten any smaller recently and that video games are blamed for just about everything you can think […]
title: Blame Video Games: Baltimore Ravens Take Players’ Games Away, Lose Anyway
